sen.j: 義朝が敗れたのち、所領を失って陸奥国へ逃れようとした佐々木秀義とその子らを渋谷荘に引き留めて援助し、秀義を婿に迎えている。
sen.e: After Yoshitomo lost, Shigekuni had Hideyoshi SASAKI, who lost his feud and was about to flee to Mutsu Province, and his sons remain at Shibuya-sho, supported them and had Hideyoshi marry his daughter.
sen.cmt: 「婿に迎えている」とは、秀義を重国の娘の一人（何人いるかわかりませんが）と結婚させた、と理解しました。

sen.j: 治承4年（1180年）8月の源頼朝挙兵では秀義の息子たちは頼朝に従い、重国は頼朝から加勢を打診されたが、伊勢平氏に対する旧恩から石橋山の戦いで平家方の大庭景親の軍に属した。
sen.e: When MINAMOTO no Yoritomo raised his army in August 1180, Hideyoshi's sons joined Yoritomo's army, and Shigekuni was asked by Yoritomo to also join his army, but Shigekuni participated in the army of Kagechika OBA, who took sides with Heike clan, in the Battle of Ishibashiyama out of his moral debt to Ise-Heishi (Taira clan).

sen.j: 石橋山の戦いで頼朝が敗れると、8月26日、景親が重国のもとを訪れ、頼朝に従った佐々木兄弟の妻子を捕らえるよう要請する。
sen.e: When Yoritomo lost in the Battle of Ishibashiyama, Kagechika visited Shigekuni on Aug. 26 and requested him to arrest the wives and children of the Sasaki brothers who followed Yoritomo.

sen.j: 重国は「彼らが旧恩のため源氏の元に参じるのを止める理由はない。私はあなたの要請に応じて外孫の佐々木義清を連れて石橋山に参じたのに、その功を考えず佐々木定綱らの妻子を捕らえよとの命を受けるのは本懐ではない」と拒否した。
sen.e: Shigekuni rejected the request, saying "I had no reason to stop them from joining the army of Genji out of their moral debt to them. I joined your army at Ishibashiyama together with my grandson Yoshikiyo SASAKI in reply to your request, but you ignored what we did for you and ordered me to arrest the wives and children of Sadatsuna SASAKI and his brother. That is not what I can accept."
